data.title: What can we do for you?
data.content: You are the last hope of the universe. Why not indeed! You can see how I lived before I met you. The key to victory is discipline, and that means a well made bed. You will practice until you can make your bed in your sleep. I'm Santa Claus! You, minion. Lift my arm. AFTER HIM! Do a flip! There's one way and only one way to determine if an animal is intelligent. Dissect its brain! I'll tell them you went down prying the wedding ring off his cold, dead finger. And I'm his friend Jesus. Check it out, y'all. Everyone who was invited is here. Incidentally, you have a dime up your nose. I suppose I could part with 'one' and still be fearedâ€¦ I never loved you. Oh, all right, I am. But if anything happens to me, tell them I died robbing some old man. I saw you with those two "ladies of the evening" at Elzars. Explain that. Who said that? SURE you can die! You want to die?!
